hero.description: Passionate about creating amazing web experiences

about.title: HELLO!
about.description: I'm Cristian Castro, a software developer with experience in designing and developing functional and scalable digital solutions. I have worked on enterprise management systems, billing systems, electronic payments, custom reports, and robust websites. I specialize in technologies like React, JavaScript, and Node.js, and I use tools like Figma to create intuitive interfaces focused on user experience. Additionally, I have implemented AI automations and designed visual identities from scratch, combining technical and creative aspects to deliver complete and efficient solutions.

education.title: Education
education.description: A skilled professional passionate about creating innovative technological solutions. My strong background in application analysis and development has given me a deep understanding of how to build efficient and robust systems. However, my approach goes beyond technical functionality: I combine my technical skills with a deep understanding of digital marketing and UX/UI design to deliver products that not only meet technical requirements but also captivate users and generate positive business results.

sena.name: Technologist Certification in Software Analysis and Development
sena.bio: I acquired strong skills in designing, creating, and maintaining computer applications. My training at SENA has prepared me to face challenges in the technological world.

google.name: Google UX Design Professional Certificate
google.bio: I learned the foundations of UX design, including ideation, wireframing, prototyping, and user research. I developed skills in using tools like Figma and Adobe XD to create user-centered designs.
